name: EthereumClaimsRegistry
description: Ethereum Claims Registry - A repository storing claims issued from any Ethereum account to any other Ethereum account.

eventDecorators.name: ClaimRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Alerts when new token was created.

eventDecorators.name: ClaimSet
eventDecorators.description: Alerts when new token was created.

functionDecorators.name: getClaim
functionDecorators.description: Allows to retrieve claims from other contracts as well as other off-chain interfaces.

parameterDecorators.name: issuer
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the issuer of the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: subject
parameterDecorators.description: The address to which the claim was issued to.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: The key used to identify the claim.

functionDecorators.name: removeClaim
functionDecorators.description: Allows to remove a claims from the registry. This can only be done by the issuer or the subject of the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: issuer
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the issuer of the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: subject
parameterDecorators.description: The address to which the claim was issued to.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: The key used to identify the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: subject
parameterDecorators.description: The address the claim is being issued to.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: The key used to identify the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The data associated with the claim.

functionDecorators.name: setSelfClaim
functionDecorators.description: Create or update a claim about yourself.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: The key used to identify the claim.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The data associated with the claim.
